description: Try our easy to follow Haloumi Crumbed Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried chicken,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Chicken
name: Haloumi Crumbed Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup rice flour (or gluten-free flour, seasoned to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice flour and eggs in separate bowls. Combine rice flakes, halloumi and oregano in another bowl. Dip each tenderloin into flour, shaking off excess. Dip in egg, then roll in crumb mixture. Repeat with remaining chicken.

Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken in batches for 3 minutes each side or until golden. Drain on paper towel. Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion and mint in a bowl. Season. Serve immediately with salad.
